title: WTB: T206 SGC 20 to 40 Walter Johnson Portrait
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 SGC 20 to 40 Walter Johnson Portrait
posts.post_content: Anyone have a decent looking t206 Johnson portrait for sale? SGC only please. I'd prefer rounded corners, back damage or dirty to creases. LMK what's available out there. Send scans and price to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
